<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>time_card</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="time_card">taskVALCHANGES^state=Processed^EQ<item endquery="false" field="task" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item display_value="Processed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Processed"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Stop Task Change On Processed Time Cards</name> <order>90</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
var errorMsg = gs.getMessage("Task record cannot be changed for processed time cards."); gs.addErrorMessage(errorMsg); current.setAbortAction(true);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-08-17 10:33:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>321c88fa535511104e41ddeeff7b12d2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Stop Task Change On Processed Time Cards</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Time Card Management" source="com.snc.time_card">3bef86e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d4343</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_321c88fa535511104e41ddeeff7b12d2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-08-17 10:39:12</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=321c88fa535511104e41ddeeff7b12d2"/> </record_update>
